question_stem.en: A 5-year-old boy is being evaluated for progressive muscle weakness that has resulted in numerous recent falls. There is no family history of muscle disorders. Physical examination reveals bilateral calf enlargement. When the patient is asked to stand, he uses his hands and arms to help push himself to an upright position. Serum creatine kinase is 12,600 U/L (normal: 30-170 U/L). Molecular tests reveal a large muscle protein that is defective due to the loss of 508 amino acid residues. Genetic analysis reveals a single base substitution within exon 48 of the gene encoding this muscle protein.
question_stem.zh: 一名 5 岁男孩正在接受评估，因为他出现进行性肌无力，导致近期多次跌倒。 没有肌病家族史。 体格检查显示双侧小腿增大。 当要求患者站立时，他用手和手臂帮助自己站立。 血清肌酸激酶为 12,600 U/L（正常值：30-170 U/L）。 分子检测显示一种大的肌肉蛋白有缺陷，原因是丢失了 508 个氨基酸残基。 基因分析显示编码该肌肉蛋白的基因的第 48 外显子内有一个单碱基替换。

question.en: This patient's gene mutation has most likely resulted in which of the following mRNA codon changes?
question.zh: 该患者的基因突变最有可能导致以下哪种 mRNA 密码子变化？

explanation.en: The patient likely has DUCHENNE MUSCULAR DYSTROPHY, an X-linked recessive disorder caused by mutations in the dystrophin gene. Although Duchenne muscular dystrophy is most commonly caused by DELETIONS resulting in frameshift mutations, NONSENSE MUTATIONS may also occur, leading to the formation of a truncated dystrophin protein. A single base substitution from UCA (serine) to UGA has introduced a PREMATURE STOP CODON in the middle of the protein sequence (nonsense mutation), resulting in early termination of protein synthesis.
explanation.zh: 该患者可能患有杜氏肌营养不良症，这是一种由肌营养不良蛋白基因突变引起的 X 连锁隐性遗传病。 虽然杜氏肌营养不良症最常见的原因是导致移码突变的缺失，但也可以发生无义突变，导致形成截短的肌营养不良蛋白。 从 UCA（丝氨酸）到 UGA 的单碱基替换在蛋白质序列中间引入了一个过早的终止密码子（无义突变），导致蛋白质合成的提前终止。

summary.en: 1) Duchenne muscular dystrophy 2) Nonsense mutations introduce premature stop codons that lead to the formation of a truncated, defective protein.
summary.zh: 1) 杜氏肌营养不良症 2) 无义突变引入过早终止密码子，导致形成截短的、有缺陷的蛋白质。

tags: Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy; Nonsense Mutation; Premature Stop Codon; Protein Synthesis
